org.eclipse.keyple.core.plugin

Interface ObservablePluginNotifier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ObservablePlugin, Plugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractObservablePlugin, AbstractThreadedObservablePlugin

    public interface ObservablePluginNotifier
extends ObservablePlugin
    Provides the API to notify the observers of an ObservablePlugin
    Since:
    0.9

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.event.ObservablePlugin
